name: top_paid_ios_apps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool app_store.
Tool description: Unofficial Apple App Store Api
API description: Fetches a list of the top paid iOS apps from the App Store.

lang.description: Language code for the results. Defaults to 'en'.

category.description: Category ID to filter results by. Defaults to '6016'.

country.description: Country code for the App Store to search in. Defaults to 'us'.

num.description: Number of results to return. Defaults to 100. Maximum is 200.
